A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Multiple flaws in the plot. If you are a true Star Wars fan prepare to be extremely disappointed\, on the other hand if this is the first Star Wars movie you've seen it's an OK movie at best. The movie is very long and was drug out. Spoiler alert.... the movie could have been about 30 min shorter if Poe would have been informed of the plan and not have had to come up with his own by sending Flynn and rose on what was a pointless and stupid mission. Overall extremely disappointed.
